      • update

        public void update(int playerNum,
                   Card card)
        If the current card is the winner, set winner equal to current playerâ€™s number and set the winning card equal to the current card. If the current card is a heart, set hearts to true. If the current card is the queen of spades, set queen to true.
        Parameters:
        playerNum -
        card -

      • getPoints

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner(Card card)
        Judge whether the card is a winner
        Parameters:
        card: - a card in the trick
        Returns:
        The isWinner method should return true unless: - the previous winning card is not null and the current card is not in the suit being played - or its number is less than the winning cardâ€™s number.
